titleStmt.title: A courtly masque: the deuice called the vvorld tost at tennis As it hath beene diuers times presented to the contentment of many noble and worthy spectators, by the prince his seruants. Inuented, and set downe, by Tho: Middleton & William Rowley gent.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
Rowley, William, 1585?-1642? aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe, and are to be sold by Edward Wright, at Christ-Church Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
